name: Kimmo Kettu
description:
You’re a hungry fox, that needs to collect as much food as possible for winter within the time limit.

Controls:

S/D = movement

space bar = jump

left click = dash

Team members and their roles:

Tiiti Liias: Graphics

Heta Selin: Graphics

Markus Huhtala: Coding

Osku Huhtala: Sound design, marketing

Nicodemos Tajakka: level design

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KettuKimmo
